name: undiagnosed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An undiagnosed illness or medical condition has not been diagnosed (= recognized and named after examination): This potentially fatal complication is often undiagnosed until late in its development.
an undiagnosed person has an illness or condition that has not been diagnosed (= recognized and named after examination): Most people with sleep disorders remain undiagnosed and untreated.
More examplesFewer examplesLike many in his generation, his dyslexia went undiagnosed for years.Her illness remained undiagnosed until her mother organized an appointment with a specialist.Research indicates that if all patients with chronic pain were screened for depression, many cases of previously undiagnosed depression would be found.
